profile.title: Profile
profile.avatarHint: Click your avatar to change picture

allergies.title: Allergies
allergies.description: Add your food allergies to receive warnings when planning recipes that contain allergens. This information is used to warn you when a planned recipe contains ingredients that match your allergies.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: API keys allow programmatic access to the Norish API. Use them for integrations, shortcuts, and automation.
apiKeys.noKeys: No API keys yet. Create one to get started.

generatedModal.title: API Key Generated
generatedModal.warning: Save this key now! You won't be able to see it again. We store only a hash and cannot recover this key.
generatedModal.hint: Use this key in the x-api-key header when making API requests.

deleteModal.title: Delete API Key
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? Any applications using it will immediately lose access. This cannot be undone.

archiveImport.title: Import Recipe Archive
archiveImport.description: Import recipes from Mela (.melarecipes), Mealie, Tandoor, or Paprika (.zip) exports

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

deleteModal.title: Delete Account
deleteModal.permanentWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone!
deleteModal.dataWarning: Your personal data including groceries, calendar entries, and notes will be permanently deleted.
deleteModal.recipesNote: Recipes you created will be preserved but will no longer be linked to your account.
deleteModal.adminNote: If you are the admin of a household with other members, you must transfer admin privileges first.

leaveModal.title: Leave Household
leaveModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to leave {name}?
leaveModal.adminWarning: You are the admin. You must transfer admin privileges before leaving.

kickModal.title: Kick User
kickModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to kick {name} from the household?
kickModal.warning: They will lose access to all shared recipes, groceries, and calendar entries.

transferModal.title: Transfer Admin Privileges
transferModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to transfer admin privileges to {name}?
transferModal.warning: You will become a regular member and will no longer be able to kick users or manage join codes.

joinCode.title: Join Code
joinCode.shareDescription: Share this code with others to invite them to your household.
joinCode.noCodeDescription: No active join code. Generate one to invite new members.

create.title: Create Household
create.description: Create a new household to share recipes and groceries with family or friends.

join.title: Join Household
join.description: Enter a join code to join an existing household.

setup.title: Setup CalDAV Sync
setup.description: Connect your CalDAV-compatible calendar to automatically sync your meal plans
setup.providerDescription: You'll need a CalDAV-compatible calendar service. Popular providers include:
setup.serverUrlDescription: Base URL of your CalDAV server (e.g., https://dav.example.com)
setup.calendarDescription: Select which calendar to sync meal plans with
setup.calendarDescriptionDisabled: Test connection to load available calendars

deleteModal.title: Delete CalDAV Configuration
deleteModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your CalDAV configuration?
deleteModal.deleteEventsDescription: Remove all events that were created in your CalDAV calendar

general.title: General
general.registrationDescription: When disabled, only existing users can sign in
general.localesDescription: Select which languages users can choose from
general.defaultLocaleDescription: Language used for new users and as fallback
general.atLeastOneLocale: At least one language must be enabled

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: When disabled, only existing users can sign in

permissions.title: Recipe Permissions
permissions.description: Control who can view, edit, and delete recipes. Server admins always have full access.
permissions.viewDescription: Who can see recipes in the dashboard

levels.householdDescription: Recipe owner and their household members

permissions.note: Note: Groceries and Calendar items follow household rules automatically, household members can always edit/delete items belonging to anyone in the same household.

cleanup.title: Cleanup Scheduler
cleanup.label: Cleanup Months
cleanup.description: Delete planned meals older than this many months

server.title: Server Management
server.restartDescription: Apply configuration changes that require a restart

restart.title: Restart Server
restart.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to restart the server?
restart.warning1: All active connections will be disconnected
restart.warning2: The server will be unavailable for a few seconds
restart.warning3: Ensure your deployment has restart: always configured, or the server will not come back online automatically

authProviders.title: Authentication Providers
authProviders.description: Configure authentication methods. Changes require a server restart to take effect.

passwordAuth.title: Email & Password
passwordAuth.description: Allow users to sign in with email and password

authProviders.oauthDescription: Configure OAuth providers for SSO authentication.

fields.name: Provider Name
fields.wellknownPlaceholder: Auto-derived from issuer if not set

claimMapping.title: Claim Mapping
claimMapping.description: Automatically assign roles and households based on OIDC claims. Users with the admin group get server admin privileges. Users with a household group are auto-joined to that household.
claimMapping.securityWarning: Warning: Enabling claim mapping allows your identity provider to control admin privileges and household membership. Only enable this if you fully trust your OIDC provider and have properly configured the group claims.
claimMapping.scopesDescription: Comma-separated list of additional OAuth scopes to request (e.g., groups for Keycloak)
claimMapping.groupsClaimDescription: Name of the claim containing user groups/roles
claimMapping.adminGroupDescription: Group name that grants server admin role (case-insensitive)
claimMapping.householdPrefixDescription: Prefix for household group names (e.g., norish_household_family => household 'family')

form.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this provider?

contentDetection.title: Content Detection
contentDetection.description: Configure how recipes are detected and parsed from web pages.

contentIndicators.title: Content Indicators
contentIndicators.subtitle: Keywords that identify recipe pages
contentIndicators.description: Schema indicators detect structured recipe data (JSON-LD, microdata). Content indicators are keywords that suggest a page contains a recipe.

units.title: Units of Measure
units.subtitle: Measurement unit definitions for parsing
units.description: Define measurement units with their short form, plural, and alternate spellings. Used when parsing ingredient quantities.

recurrence.title: Recurrence Patterns
recurrence.subtitle: Natural language patterns for recurring items
recurrence.description: Define locale-specific patterns for parsing recurrence rules from natural language (e.g., 'every week', 'om de dag').

aiProcessing.title: AI & Processing
aiProcessing.description: Configure AI-powered features for recipe extraction and video processing.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.subtitle: Customize AI instructions for recipe processing

aiConfig.enableAIDescription: Use AI to extract recipes from unstructured content
aiConfig.configureWarning: Configure the AI provider settings below to enable AI features.
aiConfig.azureEndpointDescription: Custom Azure OpenAI endpoint. Leave empty for default.
aiConfig.visionModelDescription: Optional: Use a different model for image/vision tasks. Leave empty to use the model above.
aiConfig.temperatureHint: Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative
aiConfig.autoTagAllergiesDescription: Automatically add allergy-related tags when importing recipes
aiConfig.alwaysUseAIDescription: Skip structured parsers and extract recipes using AI only
aiConfig.autoTaggingModeDescription: Automatically assign tags/keywords to imported recipes using AI

videoConfig.enableVideoDescription: Extract recipes from TikTok, Instagram, YouTube Shorts or Facebook
videoConfig.configureWarning: Configure a transcription provider below to enable video processing.
videoConfig.aiDisabledWarning: Enable AI configuration before turning on video processing.
videoConfig.maxLengthDescription: Longer videos take more time and resources to process
videoConfig.maxFileSizeDescription: Maximum size for downloaded video files
videoConfig.ytDlpVersionDescription: Version of yt-dlp to use for video downloads
videoConfig.transcriptionDescription: Convert video audio to text for recipe extraction
videoConfig.transcriptionProviderDescription: Only OpenAI and OpenAI-compatible endpoints support Whisper transcription
videoConfig.transcriptionEndpointDescription: OpenAI-compatible endpoint with Whisper support, or Ollama endpoint
videoConfig.transcriptionModelDescription: Whisper model to use for transcription
videoConfig.transcriptionApiKeyDescription: Falls back to AI Configuration API key if not set
videoConfig.transcriptionApiKeyPlaceholder: Leave empty to use AI config key
videoConfig.transcriptionApiKeyOptionalDescription: Most local Whisper servers don't require an API key

promptsConfig.recipeExtractionDescription: This prompt is used when extracting recipe data from web pages or video transcripts.
promptsConfig.unitConversionDescription: This prompt is used when converting recipe measurements between metric and US systems. Available variables: sourceSystem, targetSystem, units
promptsConfig.nutritionEstimationDescription: This prompt is used when estimating nutrition information for a recipe. Available variables: recipeName, servings, ingredients
promptsConfig.autoTaggingDescription: This prompt is used to generate tags for imported recipes. Define tagging rules and predefined tags list.
